languages.text:
While the Cyber-Eagle is not unconscious, any extra turn given by the Overseer also increases their ally's AGI by {uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} and PER by {uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c}.
If the Cyber-Eagle is also {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Soaring{/g}, this bonus is doubled.

traits.locale_text:
While the Cyber-Eagle is not unconscious, any extra turn given by the Overseer also increases their ally's AGI by {uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} and PER by {uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c}.
If the Cyber-Eagle is also {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Soaring{/g}, this bonus is doubled.

languages.text:
While the cyber-eagle is in combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally, that ally gains +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, these bonuses are doubled.

traits.locale_text:
While the cyber-eagle is in combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally, that ally gains +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this bonuses are doubled.

If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, these bonuses are doubled.

If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, these bonuses are doubled.

languages.text:
Mientras la ciberáguila esté participando en el combate, cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} otorgue un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} a un aliado, dicho aliado gana +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Si la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, estas bonificaciones se duplican.

While the cyber-eagle is in combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally, that ally gains +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
当生化猎鹰处于战斗中时，每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}赋予盟友{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，该盟友都会获得+{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}与+{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，效果持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。
如果生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，则加成效果翻倍。

While the cyber-eagle is in combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally, that ally gains +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, these bonuses are doubled.

languages.text:
Lorsque le cyber-aigle est au combat, chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} octroie un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié, ce dernier bénéficie d'un bonus de +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Si le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, ces bonus sont doublés.
languages.original_text:
While the cyber-eagle is in combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally, that ally gains +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, siber kartal çatışmadayken bir dost birime her {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırdığında o dost birim aynı zamanda +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmişse{/g} bu bonuslar ikiye katlanır.

While the cyber-eagle is in combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally, that ally gains +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, these bonuses are doubled.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, siber kartal çatışmadayken bir dost birime her {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırdığında o dost birim aynı zamanda +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmişse{/g} bu bonuslar ikiye katlanır.

languages.text:
Пока киберорел в строю, когда его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, этот союзник до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} получает +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}.
Если киберорел находится {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, эти бонусы удваиваются.

Пока киберорел в строю, когда его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, этот союзник до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} получает +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバー・イーグルが戦闘に参加している間、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary監督官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} を味方に与えるたび、その味方は{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の終了時まで、+{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} と +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} を得る。
サイバー・イーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}ソアリング{/g} している場合、これらのボーナスは2倍になる。

While the cyber-eagle is in combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally, that ally gains +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, these bonuses are doubled.

traits.locale_text:
サイバー・イーグルが戦闘に参加している間、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} を味方に与えるたび、その味方は{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g} の終了時まで、+{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} と +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} を得る。
サイバー・イーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}ソアリング{/g} している場合、これらのボーナスは2倍になる。

languages.text:
Wenn der Cyber-Adler im Kampf ist und der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} einem Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewährt, erhält dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +{uip|AGI Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und +{uip|PER Bonus|cd1bc2285bb54db78734297bc404684c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, werden diese Boni verdoppelt.
